  The computer movement type in-use by the client.

items:
  - name: Default
    summary: |
      The default is KeyboardMouse.
    value: 0
    tags: []

  - name: KeyboardMouse
    summary: |
      The player's character is controlled using the keyboard and mouse.
    value: 1
    tags: []
    deprecationmessage: ''
  - name: ClickToMove
    summary: |
      The player can right-click in the game world and their character will move
      there. In addition, the player can also control their character with their
      mouse and keyboard.
    value: 2
